import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-candidate-list', templateUrl: './candidateListView.html', styleUrls: ['./candidateListView.css'] }) export class CandidateListView { userRole:string = 'admin'; showCandidateDetail(candidateId:string) { window.location.href = this.userRole + "/check/candidate/detail/" + candidateId; } }
